activities: Temporary storage of data for the purposes of processing and hygiene.  Suppressions are removed from the incoming file, the clean output is returned to the sender, and the source file(s) are deleted/destroyed.
eucountries: Belgium, France, Italy, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data only, submitted by independent organizations for the purpose of suppression processing
privacyprograms: The Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: Through contact with the Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
